name: Create Zoho Inventory adjustments for new Android barcode scans
description: Every time a barcode is scanned in the [Make Android App](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.integromat.android) (with a quantity entered in the description), Make will automatically create an inventory adjustment in Zoho Inventory for the matching item. Then, an Android push notification is sent to notify the user about the completion of the inventory adjustment.
